business-schedule.title: Business to be taken in European Committees
business-schedule.division-heading: Business to be taken in European Committees
business-schedule.division-note: The following list consists of European Union Documents to be considered in European Committees. The dates appointed for consideration are provisional.

european-committee-motion.motion-text: That the Committee takes note of European Union Document No. 15049/09 and Addenda 1 to 3, Commission Communication on an EU framework for cross-border crisis management in the banking sector; and endorses the Government’s approach in agreeing the framework for cross-border crisis management. [3rd Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-iii, Chapter 3].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: To be considered at 4.30 pm on 2 March 2010.
european-committee-motion.item-heading: 2 EUROPEAN DEFENCE AGENCY ACTIVITY IN 2009 AND 2010
european-committee-motion.motion-text: That the Committee takes note of unnumbered explanatory memorandum dated 10 December 2009, Report by the Head of the European Defence Agency to the Council on activities in 2009, and European Union Documents No. 16275/09, European Defence Agency document on Three year financial framework 2010–2012, postponement and 2010 Budget adoption and No. 16462/09, European Defence Agency Guidelines for the Agency’s work in 2010; and supports the Government’s aim of ensuring that the EDA is used to deliver enhanced military capability across the EU.[4th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-iv, Chapter 3].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: To be considered at 4.00 pm on 1 March 2010.
european-committee-motion.motion-text: That the Committee takes note of European Union Documents No. 9494/09 and Addenda 1 and 2, Draft Directive on Alternative Investment Fund Managers and amending Directives 2004/39/EC and 2009/.../EC, and No. 15162/09, Opinion of the European Central Bank of 16 October 2009 on a Draft Directive on Alternative Investment Fund Managers and Amending Directives 2004/39/EC and 2009/.../EC; and endorses the Government’s approach in seeking agreement to the Directive.[7th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-vi, Chapter 2].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: To be considered at 4.30 pm on 23 February 2010.
european-committee-motion.motion-text: An Unnumbered Explanatory Memorandum dated 19 January 2010 submitted by the Foreign and Commonwealth Office relating to a Council Decision on a European Union military mission to contribute to the training of Somali Security Forces was referred to European Committee B on 20 January 2010 by the European Scrutiny Committee [8th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-vii, Chapter 2].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: Date and time of consideration to be arranged.
european-committee-motion.motion-text: European Union Documents No. 14685/09 and No. 5271/10 and Addendum 1, and No. 15365/09 and Addendum 1, relating to the Instrument for Structural Policy for Pre-accession, were referred to European Committee B on 9 February 2010 by the European Scrutiny Committee.

european-committee-motion.scheduled: Date and time of consideration to be arranged.
